snippet: If the Palestinians are admitted as a “nonmember” observer state in the U.N. General Assembly, they will win a short-term victory with serious long term risks.
abstract: Editorial warns that Palestinian Authority plans to seek admission as 'nonmember' observer state in United Nations General Assembly is move that will do no one any good and will cement impasse over negotiated peace; blames Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu for refusing to compromise on creation of viable Palestinian state, and warns that if Mitt Romney wins presidential election, chance of American peace initiative will vanish.
lead_paragraph: If the Palestinians are admitted as a “nonmember” observer state in the U.N. General Assembly, they will win a short-term victory with serious long term risks.

headline.seo: Palestinians at the United Nations, Again
